title.narrative: District Capitals Water Supply Project (formerly Oecussi and Ermera Water Rehabilitation Project)

description.narrative: The Timor-Leste: Oecussi and Ermera Water Rehabilitation Project will help Ermera, Oecussi, and another district manage their water resources better. The Project will reduce water-related diseases and raise household incomes, particularly for women.
